name: Making a Change
description:
**UPDATE** There is a problem with the executable. Currently trying to figure out how to fix it. 

This is a short game made in RPG Maker for the Narrative GameJam. It's inspired by real life events for me in the last month or so. It's partially me processing some things about career paths and big changes. 

Due to some IRL events, I cut it off at day 1 in game. I couldn't get all the art I wanted done, but once I finish drawing I'll upload the finished version. 

This is the first time I've ever uploaded an RPGM file anywhere, please let me know if something is broken and I will try to fix it!
